<template>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';
export default {
  data() {
    return {
       memos: " ",
       count: 0,
        counterS: 0,
        counterM: 0,
        counterA: 0,
        counterB: 0,
        counterK: 0,
        t: '',
        a:'',
        idS: [],
        idM: [],
        idA: [],
        idB: [],
        idK: [],
        idZ: [],
    };
  },
  mounted () {
      this.Hanbetu();
  },
  Hanbetsu(studentId,users) {//学籍番号で分ける
        for (var i = 0; i <= this.count ; i++){
          this.a = studentId.slice( 0, 1 ) ;
          if(this.a == "s"){
            this.idS.push(users);
            this.$emit('set',this.idS)
          }else if(this.a == "m"){
            this.idM.push(users);
            this.$emit('set',this.idM)
          }else if(this.a == "a"){
            this.idA.push(users);
            this.$emit('set',this.idA)
          }else if(this.a == "k"){
            this.idK.push(users);
            this.$emit('set',this.idK)
          }else if(this.a == "b"){
            this.idB.push(users);
            this.$emit('set',this.idB)
          }else{
            this.idZ.push(users);
            this.$emit('set',this.idZ)
          }
        }
        this.Sort(this.idS);
        this.Sort(this.idM);
        this.Sort(this.idA);
        this.Sort(this.idB);
        this.Sort(this.idK);
        this.Sort(this.idZ);
      },
      Sort(a) {
        for(var i=0;i<a.length-1;i++){
          for(var j=a.length-1;j>i;j--){
	          if(a[j]<a[j-1]){
	            this.t=a[j];
	            a[j]=a[j-1];
	            a[j-1]=this.t;
	          }
          }
        }
      }
};
</script>
